name: SyntheticFi
headline: Cheapest way to get liquidity from your stock investments
description: SyntheticFi offers a low cost and low hassle solution for independent financial advisors (RIAs) to meet the liquidity needs of their clients.

founders.name: Tony Yang, Founder
founders.description: Ex-Stripe. UC Berkeley class of 2020. Personal finance nerd.

# Securities-backed lending. Reimagined.
Get 1% - 3% lower interest rate for your clients, and eliminate pledged account paperwork and delay
[Get in touch](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/cal.com/joseph-yz-wang/syntheticfi-30min>)
# Interest rate for your clients
# 4.83%
# SOFR + 0.50%
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/65b883d1677fb974693be182_Untitled_design__3_-removebg.png)
# Loved by independent financial advisors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52fffa1096f222006a6fa_transparent-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52ce5084df10aeca495e6_Sora_Logo_Black.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52ce51f71a2ecdf57933b_Able-Wealth-Logo%20\(2\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52d45084df10aeca4f698_Mendel-Money-Logo-removebg-preview.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52ea457449f73afe88c2c_Copy%20of%20sweep.money.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52f3e58de957ca8afa979_pair%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52fffa1096f222006a6fa_transparent-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52ce5084df10aeca495e6_Sora_Logo_Black.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52ce51f71a2ecdf57933b_Able-Wealth-Logo%20\(2\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52d45084df10aeca4f698_Mendel-Money-Logo-removebg-preview.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52ea457449f73afe88c2c_Copy%20of%20sweep.money.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66e52f3e58de957ca8afa979_pair%20\(1\).png)
# Low cost liquidity solution for all your clients
#### Our interest rate is typically 1% - 3% lower than existing products on interest rates, with low minimums.
### TriState / Schwab PAL
### SyntheticFi
### Interest rate
### SOFR + 2.40% ~ 4.40%
### SOFR + 0% ~ 0.50%
### Minimums
### $100,000
### $10,000
### Paperwork
### Pledged account adds paperwork
### No extra paperwork
### Tax-deductibility of interest expenses
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654e4bb805b6369713d4fdb_2360-cross.png)
### No, except for limited scenarios
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/65a9b10a59af9bca943d3a94_LKaXU.png)
### Always tax deductible
* Rates are floating based on a fixed spread tied to the Secured Overnight Financing Rates (SOFR). Excludes SyntheticFi management fees.
[Real-time rate quotes](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/app.syntheticfi.com/cob>)[Review our fact sheet](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6735a5382c8f5420b931175a_SyntheticFi%20Securities-Backed%20Lending%20Program%20Brochure.pdf>)
# Integrated seamlessly with your stack
Our entire onboarding process is fully digitalized. No wet signature needed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b498_608196197-vector%20\(1\).svg)
### Custodian-agnostic solution
#### We support major custodians such as Charles Schwab. Your client don't need to move their assets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/65fb4ecb6bca2c177fd33c11_09cb66ac691073bbe828737b48474577-removebg-preview%20\(1\)%20\(1\).png)
### Streamlined process
#### No credit check needed. No wet signature. Clients only need to sign a single application DocuSign package.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b48e_illustration-student-1x1.svg)
### TAMP and SMA support
#### SyntheticFi supports existing money managers, such as SMAs, UMAs and TAMPs.
[Book a demo](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/cal.com/joseph-yz-wang/syntheticfi-30min>)
## Frequently Asked Questions
### How is SyntheticFi able to offer a lower interest rate than other lenders?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi offers a low interest rate by eliminating expenses and fees charged by custodians like Charles Schwab. Instead of negotiating interest rates with Charles Schwab, we help you directly access the institutional borrowing market on stock exchanges for your clients.We do this with a strategy called box spreads. Read more about box spreads [here](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/app.syntheticfi.com/box-spread>). 
### What are box spreads used by SyntheticFi?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi uses "box spreads" constructed from listed S&P 500 Index options. You can think of box spreads as standardized loan contracts traded at stock exchanges. They have competitive pricing from the bid-ask process on the stock exchange. Read more about box spreads [here](https://www.syntheticfi.com/</how-it-works-old>).
### Is it a line of credit, or is there a term duration?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi works like a line of credit. Your client can keep a balance open, potentially indefinitely. There are options to lock in a fixed interest rate too.This line of credit is implemented with a month-to-month box spread strategy. That means every month SyntheticFi will implement a new box spread to take out a loan from the stock exchange, paying back the expiring box spread loan if needed.
### How does repayment of the loan work?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
We recommend clients to make interest-only payments to cover the interest expense from each month. They have the option to include the interest from each month in the loan principal.Client can pay off the loan arranged by SyntheticFi at any time. They do so by depositing the payment in their own brokerage account, and instructing SyntheticFi to exit the box spread loan from the market.
### What are the minimums for using SyntheticFi?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi has a much lower minimum compared to other lenders of securities-backed loans. Our minimum loan size is $10,000.
### How long does it take to set up SyntheticFi and withdraw money?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi takes about 1 week to onboard a client. Once onboarded, the client can withdraw money at any time.
### What can my clients use the funds from SyntheticFi for?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
There is no limit on the purpose of the borrowed funds.
### What fees does SyntheticFi charge?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi charges 0.50% of the amount borrowed by the client on an annual basis. This fee is subject to volume discount and case-by-case negotiations.For example, if a client borrows $100,000 for 6 months, they need to pay a management fee of $100,000 * 0.50% * 6 / 12 = $250.
### How much can my client borrow with SyntheticFi?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
In general, you are allowed to borrow up to 50% of your non-retirement investments. We are happy to review the specific portfolio of your clients to give you a definitive answer.
### What are the risks from using SyntheticFi?
![FAQ drop-down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6654221e4821adea5b1f5de3_Arrow%20Square%20down%201%20-%2024px.svg)
SyntheticFi has comparable margin call risk as margin loans or securities-backed line of credit.Because SyntheticFi uses box spread options to reduce the cost of borrowing, there are additional risks:‍- Interest-rate risk: Box spreads used in the SyntheticFi Securities-Backed Lending Program involve a fixed payoff on a future date, which functions like a zero-coupon bond. It has the same interest rate risk as any other fixed-income investment.‍- Execution risk: In extreme market conditions (e.g. market closures) or due to technical difficulties, SyntheticFi might fail to roll over the box spreads due to lack of liquidity in the market. In this case, the client will automatically take out a margin loan and may need to pay margin interest, until execution is restored.
# Have more questions?
Schedule a video call with one of our licensed professionals.
[Schedule a call](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/cal.com/joseph-yz-wang/syntheticfi-30min>)
### [Check the background of SyntheticFi, LLC on SEC website](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/adviserinfo.sec.gov/firm/summary/330200>)
### [Form CRS](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/reports.adviserinfo.sec.gov/crs/crs_330200.pdf>)
### [Firm brochure](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/files.adviserinfo.sec.gov/IAPD/Content/Common/crd_iapd_Brochure.aspx?BRCHR_VRSN_ID=930669>)
SyntheticFi, LLC is an investment advisor registered with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. SyntheticFi does not provide tax, legal or accounting advice. This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice. You should consult your own tax, legal and accounting advisors before engaging in any transaction. Investing carries inherent risks, and investment outcomes are not guaranteed unless stated otherwise. Before adopting any investment strategy, we strongly recommend consulting with a qualified financial advisor and/or tax professional.
By using syntheticfi.com, you accept our [Terms of Use](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/66565331dddcb55244a42c57_SyntheticFi%2C%20LLC%20Common%20Paper%20TOS%20-%2005282024.pdf>) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.syntheticfi.com/<https:/cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a961bcb031c28e4d30b483/6656559dd9d64bb110c7b0b1_Online%20Privacy%20Policy.pdf>). SyntheticFi is only available to US residents. © 2024 SyntheticFi, LLC

generated_description:
**SyntheticFi: Revolutionizing Securities-Backed Lending**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, SyntheticFi is a fintech startup based in San Francisco with a clear mission: to provide the cheapest way for investors to gain liquidity from their stock investments. With a compact team of just two employees and backed by notable figures like Jared Friedman from Y Combinator, the company seeks to redefine how independent financial advisors (RIAs) can access cash without the traditional hassle.

### What Do They Do?

SyntheticFi is all about offering low-cost, straightforward solutions for financial advisors to meet their clients' liquidity needs. Their innovations revolve around securities-backed lending, allowing clients to secure loans at interest rates that are typically 1% - 3% lower than existing products. They achieve this by utilizing a strategy known as box spreads, an efficient way of accessing the institutional borrowing market directly through stock exchanges. 

Clients benefit from:
- **Lower Interest Rates**: Interest rates typically pegged at SOFR (Secured Overnight Financing Rate) + 0.50%, with current rates as low as 4.83%.
- **No Extra Paperwork**: Unlike traditional lenders that require a significant amount of documentation, SyntheticFi streamlines the process with fully digital onboarding, eliminating unnecessary delays.
- **Flexibility**: They operate like a line of credit, allowing clients to keep their balance open possibly indefinitely. Funds can be used for any purpose, and repayment can align with clients' needs.

### Why SyntheticFi Matters

In an investment landscape often bogged down by complex procedures and high fees, SyntheticFi shines. Its user-friendly approach taps into the growing demand for efficiency in financial services, especially for those managing large portfolios. They support various custodians like Charles Schwab, which means clients don’t need to shift their assets, preserving their existing financial relationships.

### The Road Ahead

With one year under their belt and a vision to innovate further, SyntheticFi is an exciting player in the fintech scene. By delivering a compelling mix of lower costs, streamlined processes, and advisor-focused solutions, they're looking to carve out a significant space in securities-backed lending—and potentially reshape how investors think about liquidity from stocks.

To learn more about how SyntheticFi works and how it can benefit financial advisors and their clients, visit their website at [SyntheticFi.com](https://www.syntheticfi.com/). 

In summary, SyntheticFi is one of those startups that you keep your eye on, especially if you value efficiency in finance and want to see how they continue to challenge the status quo.
